data.text:
Create, share, host, and monetize videos and livestreams with Switcher Studio â a complete online video platform.

One subscription, everything video.

- CREATE branded multicamera livestreams and videos.

- SHARE with built-in Multistreaming.

- HOST video content on your website.

- MONETIZE with gated content and shoppable video.

How will you use Switcher Studio?

CREATE VIDEOS AND LIVESTREAMS

- Our app is a mobile production studio: Stream or record. Horizontal or vertical. iPhones or iPads.

- Connect up to 9 devices for wireless multicamera productions. Customize the look with layouts like grid, split-screen, picture-in-picture, and more.

- Customize visuals â by adding logos, graphics, text, photos, prerecorded videos, and more â in real time. Edit our built-in graphics templates with your branding or upload your own files.

- Display live comments, polls, scoreboards, timers, and more.

- Invite up to five guests or collaborators to join from anywhere in the world and on any device. Even share screens and webcams.

SHARE AND HOST YOUR CONTENT

- Stream directly to Facebook, YouTube, Twitch, Twitter, or Microsoft Stream â or use custom RTMP to reach anywhere else.

- Use the embeddable Switcher Player to turn your website into a content channel. Upload videos or stream live to your webpage. Curate playlists of content to keep people on your site.*

- Reach multiple destinations at once with our built-in Multistreaming functionality.

- Use Switcher as a Webcam for virtual experiences in Zoom, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams.

- Export and upload to your Switcher video library from the app. Manage and store recordings on the cloud.

- Short form social video. Create and edit clips of your Switcher productions. Then share to social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok.

VIDEO MONETIZATION ON YOUR TERMS*

- Earn revenue directly from supporters when you put your videos behind a paywall on your website with Gated Content. Decide exactly what to charge for your content and which videos to include. Even sell tickets to livestreams.

- Shopify merchants: Sync your collections with Switcher to create shoppable videos and streams. Sell via comments on Facebook or feature products on your website using the Switcher Player.

- Collect tips and donations by linking to platforms like Venmo and Tithe.ly to your Switcher Player.

SWITCHER SUBSCRIPTIONS

We offer in-app purchases for a 30-day Switcher Studio Monthly limited subscription. Our 14-day free trial includes limited features. To explore our full suite of tools or compare features, visit the Switcher Studio website.

*The Switcher Studio App is the video production component of our full suite of video features. It can be used alone (to livestream or record videos on iOS) or alongside our browser-based features to monetize. Our embeddable video player and monetization tools are not included in the free trial, and are only available as a demo experience in the Switcher Studio Monthly subscription. Visit our website to learn more.

Have questions? Not sure where to begin? Drop us a line at support@switcherstudio.com.

Privacy Policy: http://switcherstudio.com/privacy-policy

Terms of Use: http://switcherstudio.com/terms-of-use

Compatible Devices: http://switcherstudio.com/compatible-devices
